title: Lesson 42
paragraph: Companionship and amplification strengthen relationships. Companions who collaborate, magnify efforts, and calibrate actions yield stronger results.

words.meaning: a person or animal with whom one spends time
words.example: He enjoys hiking with his loyal companion.

words.example: He tried to dictate the terms of the agreement.
The farm yields a good harvest.

words.example: Trust is the core of any relationship.
